blogPost.excerpt: This iOS widget pack allows you to track your Gumroad analytics with beautiful charts on your iPhone or iPad's home screen via iOS shortcuts. The dashboard pulls in metrics from Gumroad such as orders/revenue, plus breaks down your most popular products. 📊
blogPost.body: This iOS widget pack allows you to track your Gumroad analytics with beautiful charts on your iPhone or iPad's home screen via iOS shortcuts. The dashboard pulls in metrics from Gumroad such as orders/revenue, plus breaks down your most popular products. 📊
blogPost.title: Gumroad Sales Dashboard for iOS - iOS widget to track Gumroad sales on the home screen
blogPost.author: Justin Veenema

localize.description: 这个iOS小工具包允许您通过iOS快捷键在您的iPhone或iPad的主屏幕上用漂亮的图表来跟踪您的Gumroad分析。仪表板拉在Gumroad的指标，如订单/收入，再加上打破你最流行的产品。📊
localize.tagline: 在主屏幕上跟踪Gumroad销售的iOS小工具

localize.description: 這個iOS小工具包允許您通過iOS快捷鍵在您的iPhone或iPad的主屏幕上用漂亮的圖表來跟蹤您的Gumroad分析。儀表板拉在Gumroad的指標，如訂單/收入，再加上打破你最流行的產品。📊
localize.tagline: 在主屏幕上跟蹤Gumroad銷售的iOS小工具

previous.excerpt: The pack you've been looking for to bring your website or app to the next level. This pack contain 100 animated icons, rendered in svg, ready to be integrated to your website. The pack will be regularily updated with new versions of the icons to fit all your needs.
previous.title: Iconimations - Svg animated icons pack, ready to be integrated to your site

localize.description: 你一直在寻找的包，使你的网站或应用程序到一个新的水平。该包包含100个动画图标，以svg格式渲染，准备集成到您的网站。该包将定期更新新版本的图标，以满足您的所有需求。
localize.tagline: Svg动画图标包，可以整合到您的网站上。

localize.description: 你一直在尋找的包，使你的網站或應用程序到一個新的水平。該包包含100個動畫圖標，以svg格式渲染，準備集成到您的網站。該包將定期更新新版本的圖標，以滿足您的所有需求。
localize.tagline: Svg動畫圖標包，可以整合到您的網站上。
